Package cmput301.f13t01.editstory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChoiceListListener
    The ChoiceListListener interface is an interface that must be implemented by any activity using a ChoiceListFragment.
    ImageResizeListener
    The ImageResizeListener interface is used to handle scaling selection.
    StoryFragmentListListener
    The StoryFragmentListListener interface is an interface that must be implemented by any activity using a StoryFragmentListFragment.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChoiceListAdapter
    The ChoiceListAdapter class is the ArrayAdapter for the ChoiceList Fragment.
    ChoiceListFragment
    This class is used to create a dialog to show all available choices for a fragment, and handle user selection of choices.
    EditAnnotationActivity
    This activity allows the user to edit and maintain a particular story annotation's content.
    EditFragmentChoiceActivity
    This activity allows the user to edit a choice in a particular fragment.
    EditFragmentContentActivity
    This activity allows the user to edit and maintain a particular story fragment's content.
    EditFragmentInfoActivity
    This activity allows the user to edit and maintain a particular story fragment's information.
    EditStoryActivity
    The activity that allows the user to edit a story's information, in addition to make decisions regarding which fragment they would like to view, add, etc.
    FragmentListAdapter
    The FragmentListAdapter class is the ArrayAdapter for the FragmentList Fragment.
    ImageInfo
    The ImageInfo class is used to display and scale images in the UI.
    ImageResizeFragment
    The ImageResizeFragment class is used to select a scale to resize an image.
    PreviewFragmentActivity
    This activity allows the user to preview a particular storyFragment's content.
    StoryBitmapFactory
    The StoryBitmapFactory class is used to output Bitmap objects for the UI
    StoryFragmentListFragment
    This class is used to create a dialog to show all available fragments for a story, and handle user selection of fragments.
    StoryFragmentViewFactory
    The StoryFragmentViewFactory class is used to generate the views for media within a fragment.
